title: First Aid Family Guide
creator: Six Pac Creations ~ I Am Creations & Design

extendedInfo.description: *Download First Aid Family Guide for .25 off the regular price!First Aid Family is "A First Aid Guide for All"This app is an A-Z guide of First Aid for Families, Teachers, Moms, Dads & Anyone who requires first aid help FAST, just in case the unthinkable happens you will have first aid right on your device.*10% of your purchase of this First Aid Family Guide App will go to The Red Cross.Accidents happen. So does the unexpected. Itâs best to be prepared. Thatâs where this First Aid Family Guide App comes in. Features:- It is SIMPLE & EASY to Use-This app takes up very little space up on your device, less than 1MB- Email any topic of information to family & friends by choosing the option button on your device.-10% of your purchase of this First Aid Family Guide App will go to The Red Cross.- It also features caching (saving) to your device for offline viewing when you have no internet reception. (*View the section that you want first with an internet connection only one time & then your device will have it stored for offline viewing if you need.)- Ad Free- It is packed with over 90 sections of first aid treatment for all sections as well as home remedies (for specific sections).Here is the Table of Contents:Abdominal Injuries                           Acute BronchitisAllergiesAnaphylactic ShockAppendicitisAnorexia & BulimiaAntibioticsBitesBlack EyeBlistersBreast CancerBreathing ProblemsBroken BonesBurnsCalling 911Carbon Monoxide PoisoningChicken PoxChokingCold InjuriesCold SoresColicCommon ColdConcussionsConjunctivitisConstipationCorns and CallusesCPRCuts and WoundsDehydrationDentalDiabeticDepressionDiarrheaDrug OverdosesEAR - Rescue BreathingEar InfectionsEczemaEmergency Action PlanEpilepsyEye InjuriesFallsFaintingFamily Disaster KitFeverFirst Aid Kit ChecklistFood PoisoningFood SafetyGluten AllergyHeadachesHeart attackHeart BurnHeat IllnessHydrocolloidsHypothermiaIndigestionInfluenzaInsect BitesIBSLaryngitisLiceLightning StrikesLost In The WoodsMedical HistoryMedicine SafetyMeningitisMonoMotion sicknessMuscle CrampsNausea and VomitingNear DrowningNosebleedsOsteoporosisPeptic UlcersPoisonPoison Ivy, Oak and SumacRecovery PositionRib InjuriesSeizuresShockShaken Baby SyndromeSkin Closure StripsSore ThroatSplintersSprainsStrep ThroatStuck ObjectsSuicideTaking TempTape WormsTick BitesTonsillitisToxic ShockWhooping CoughYeast Infection*You can make a difference for yourself, friends & family... with the purchase of this app (10% of your purchase will go to The Red Cross.)Thank you ~
